nodes.text: Cad Bane: Jedi Hunter is an online game on StarWars.com that was released on December 17, 2010. It features the bounty hunter Cad Bane in his infiltration of the Senate Building.
Darth Sidious has hired Cad Bane to strike against the Republic. This gun-for-hire must first prove his skills in a mission in the heart of Coruscant.

Your goal is to blast through this Senate building, taking out all the Senate Guards and clone troopers in each level before the time runs out. Once the level is clear, you will move onto a new position.
